show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today we have a Father’s Day program as I’m joined for they hour by special guest co-host Rad Dad author Tomas... <!--more--> Moniz.
  We will look at the state of attachment parenting, of fatherhood, corporate media framing of fathers, and more.
At the bottom of the hour we will hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio; and we round out today’s show with Adam Mansbach, author of Go the F**k to Sleep.
